title: potential bug again?
body: screen blacks out, sound effects can be heard, and the only way to get back in is to restart your computer. I have turned off every single overlay problem, and this happens again.

replies.body:
You've posted about a few issues in the past that all sound like client side drama. I'd strongly recommend you run a clean reinstall of your game with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that doesn't resolve your issues submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
I have this problem on camera. but I think it may be my computer.
